_meanings:
{@--1@} To place or put
together, join, unite.

{@--3@} To install, place on the
throne; <ls>R. 17. 8.</ls>

{@--5@} To 
concentrate, fix or apply intently
upon (as the eye, mind &c.);  
<ls>Bg. 12. 9</ls>; <ls>Bh. 3. 48.</ls>

{@--6@} To satisfy,
clear or solve (a doubt), answer
an objection; {#iti samADatte#} (in 
commentaries).

{@--9@} To entrust,
commit to, deliver over.
